Sorin Medical Front Loading Programmer Bag

The Sorin Front Loading programmer bag is designed to hold your programmer, documents, accessories, and cables. The bag is foam padded to protect your programmer from damage. The two outer pockets and inner pouch cable pocket are perfect for everything else you need to carry with your programmer. The bag is water resistant and made of the best materials available.

CUSTOM BAG FEATURES:

  • Sorin Group (or any other) Company Logo
  • You can add your name or any other text to the bag
  • Telescoping pull handle
  • Our Watts Bags exclusive wheel system
  • Plastic guards to prevent handle from denting
  • Commercial grade buckles, handles, fabrics, and zippers
  • 2 Large outer pouch pockets for all of your accessories
  • 1 removable mesh cable pocket on the inside

Sorin Medical Front Loading Programmer Bag

  • Rigid Weight: 9.3 lbs
  • External Dimensions: 26.5" Deep x 17.5" Wide x 9.75" Long
  • Internal Dimensions: 21" Deep x 16.5" Wide x 7.25" Long
    • Learn more about bag features
    • Available Colors:
    • Watts Wheel System: Yes
    • Internal Divider Options: Yes
    • Custom Embroidery: Yes
    • Price: $220
